title: a commander keen beat-em up game
content:
well, since im bak and ready to make games again, i decided to plan on making a Commander Keen beat-em up game, unlike stick movies, ever since 2 years ago.

Descriptions:
------------------------
Title: n/a (any suggestions plz post)
Type of game: Beat-em up similar to dbl dragons (not like street fighting [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-no.gif[/img] )
types of attack: melee, and range, or hand to hand combat
1 - 2 players : >_> also online, once i finish the engine.
versus mode : either online or offline
there might b some cut-scenes. i need artists on art of course
release date: do not expect it to be today roflcopter, or the next month. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-deadkeenvort.gif[/img]

Note: this is just a plan. not really starting a storyline, un til i say so. so y am i still here, i better get to work on the beat-em up engine. closes window

title: Re: a commander keen beat-em up game
content:
Hmmm a title? How about Commander and Keenquer? [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-crazy.gif[/img] A proud member of the signature stealing society

[img]http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v410/Gannalev/Kazz.gif[/img]

"No one should be here."
-Levellord

title: Neat!!!
content:
Cool!!! Will it be in 3d? All Beat 'em up games in 2d kind'a stink; there is no way your attack can miss your opponent.

3d please!?!

-- NAJAWA --

title: Re: Neat!!!
content:
Yeah right, set a standard for him that he impossible can match. Make a 3d game yourself if you want one.-----------------
[img]http://jamba.nl/storage/view/335/0/cr/CrazyFrog___Axel_F_Rocket.gif[/img]
Jamster! rules!

title: Re: Neat!!!
content: its gonna b 2d tho, since i need to get bak on mmf skills cuz i had skills on flash mx, and lost the memory of mmf, and btw, its 2d, similar like the ninja turtles games at the arcades, the 1 w/ four players

title: Re: Neat!!!
content:
Not all 2D fight games are that bad.. Besides, you can't miss your opponent in many 3D ones either.
It's hard work doing all the different sprites for moves.. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-dead.gif[/img]
Good luck![url=http://www.keengrid.net/]keengrid.net[/url]

title: Re: Neat!!!
content:
One Must Fall as 2D, and it was fun as well.
At least I remember it being fun... could be the nostalgia speaking.
One Must (insert the cool Keen dying tune here)!

It probably won't be your everyday fighter either I'd suspect, having the Keen creatures in mind.Retodon8
You live, you die, you are remembered, you are forgotten. [url=http://keen.retodon8.net/][img]http://retodon8.net/Graphics/Keen_Yorp.gif[/img][/url]

title: Oh... yeah!!! (duh)
content:
Duh; I was thinking of something where you just walked up to the opponent, and killed him do to the fact that you were holding a sword.

I get it; though, I think I might work on a 3d Keen beat 'em up, as practice before I start "Tarkuni," a big project I've been planning for around 4 years now; I am almost able to do something that big. Oh well.

Good lick to ya then!!! [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-wink.gif[/img]

-- NAJAWA --

title: Re: Oh... yeah!!! (duh)
content: sounds good[img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-grin.gif[/img]  keen beating up mort[img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-mortlol.gif[/img] I am the bad you are the ugly There is no good

content:

He could also fight Vorticans, Yorps, Gargs, Bloogs, Bloog Guards.

title: Re: a commander keen beat-em up game
content:
How about "Keen Streets" for a title as a take off on Mean Streets? (I'm not sure a side-scroll fighter was ever named that but one should have been!)

I'd love to see the Bean-with-bacon-megarocket touched down in the bad side of town with Keen getting jumped by Bloogs wearing trenchcoats and wielding baseball bats.

title: The name's...
content:
"The name's Blaze; Billy Blaze, though most scum call me Commander Keen."

hehehe; treanch coats, and baseball bats.

You could also have a sub-plot. Commander Keen starts to fall in love with a side-kick, but finds out she's in it for the dough, and mort sent her to get Keen's secret Identity (or something).

-- NAJAWA --

title: Re: The name's...
content: i like how najawa says his ideas like the game is his. haha.
